project.description: The Kronolith calendar provides a robust web-based calendar for any number of users or groups, with the ability to show any number of calendars in a single overlaid view. Users can create any number of calendars and grant read, edit, or full permissions to any user, group, or any combination thereof.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/*.tgz ${WORKSPACE}/*.spec ${WORKSPACE}/*.src.rpm php -d include_path=".:${WORKSPACE}/../../php-hudson-tools/workspace/pear/pear/php" ${WORKSPACE}/../../php-hudson-tools/workspace/pear/pear/horde-components -t ../../../../templates --pearrc ${WORKSPACE}/../../php-hudson-tools/workspace/pear/pear/../.pearrc -t ${WORKSPACE}/../../../../templates/openpkg -D ${WORKSPACE} -N ${WORKSPACE}/../../horde-git/workspace/kronolith mkdir -p /kolab/RPM/SRC/kronolith-H4 rsync -avz --delete-after ${WORKSPACE}/ /kolab/RPM/SRC/kronolith-H4/ mv ${WORKSPACE}/../*.tgz /kolab/RPM/SRC/kronolith-H4/ if [ "`/kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -q kronolith-H4`" != "package kronolith-H4 is not installed" ]; then for pkg in `/kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -q kronolith-H4`;do echo $pkg; /kolab/bin/openpkg rpm --nodeps -e $pkg;done;fi /kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -ba kronolith-H4.spec /kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -Uhv --force /kolab/RPM/PKG/kronolith-H4-*.`/kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -q --qf="%{ARCH}-%{OS}" openpkg`-kolab.rpm cp /kolab/RPM/PKG/kronolith-H4-*.src.rpm ${WORKSPACE}/ rm -rf /kolab/RPM/PKG/kronolith-H4-* rm -rf /kolab/RPM/SRC/kronolith-H4* rm -rf /kolab/RPM/TMP/*
